value.title: Artificial intelligence: IBM's Watson now understands idioms after 'sentiment' update
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence researchers at IBM have introduced a major upgrade to the famed Watson computer, allowing it to understand idioms and colloquialisms for the first time.
